medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his normal state of health until 2 weeks ago when he started to have epigastric pain. The pain worsened this morning accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea. He describes the pain as severe, sharp, constant, and radiating to his back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, CKD III secondary to horseshoe kidney, hypothyroidism, GERD with evidence of erosive esophagitis, traumatic brain injury at work, TIA after chiropractor neck maneuvers, left shoulder gunshot injury as a child, appendectomy (open) as a child.
